r.s: Native Extension Component for ScoutAPM's PHP Agent
r.d: ScoutAPM's extension for PHP provides additional capabilities to application monitoring over just using the base PHP userland library.
r.n: - More documentation into README.md (#38) - Better text matrix introduced, including PHP 7.4 tests (#40) - Improved argument handling for functions like `curl_exec`, `fwrite`, `fread`, `PDOStatement->execute` (#42, #43) - Bug fixes for #41 and #29 to help prevent bad configuration of overwritten functions (#44)
